quotes.quote: Hope and wishes for all that delights will sour in the midst of action not taken and words unsaid.
You should never wish for wishful thinking.
Plenty of people wish to become devout, but no one wishes to be humble.

We all have dreams and wishes. The difference is that dreams are there for you to do something with they are a component of hope for with out a dream there is no hope. A wish, however, is simply a desire to have something without doing anything to accomplish it.
We can imprison ourselves with our wants, wishes, and false dreams.
If wishes were fishes we'd all be throwing nets. If wishes were horses we'd all ride.
You must be the change you wish to see in the world.
Wishes and wants do not transform a person; actions and reactions do so! Show the world your plans by the actions you take progressively and consistently.
The wishes of an honest man do not stretch beyond what he undoubtedly deserves.
Wishes, like castles in the air, are inexpensive and not taxable.
When all of your wishes are granted, many of your dreams will be destroyed.
Every man desires to live long, but no man wishes to be old.
A gentleman wishes to be slow to speak and quick to act.
There's no point having wishes if you don't at least try to do them.
No wise man ever wished to be younger.
A goal without a plan is just a wish.
Never be afraid to wish for what you really want in life. Wishes are possible manifestation of thoughts.
Wishes, like painted landscapes, best delight, Whilst distance recommends them to the sight. Plac'd afar off, they beautiful appear: But show their coarse and nauseous colors near.
Sometimes things become possible if we want them bad enough.
Nothing is so common place as to wish to be remarkable.
We often confuse what we wish for with what is.

What one wishes is to be touched by truth and to be able to interpret that truth so that one may use what one is feeling and experiencing, be it despair or joy, in a way that will add meaning to one's life and will hopefully touch others as well.
If the wishes came true, they came true in terrible ways. Wishes were dangerous things. That was the idea you got from fairy tales.
There would be a time, when you will ask for nothing but life.
When wishes are few, the heart is happy. When craving ends, there is peace.
Hopes, wants and wishes, all cast across the night sky with my heart in tow.
Rather than wishing for change, you first must be prepared to change.
Wishes are sometimes just stories that have nowhere to go.
A necessary skill for achieving that which you desire in your life is the ability to give the task at hand that one last go around.
Wishes don't bring riches; work make things work.
